terms.name: applicantId
terms.description: Identifier for the applicant submitting the permit request.

terms.name: permitType
terms.description: Type of permit requested (e.g., building, business).

terms.name: zoningCompliance
terms.description: Whether the request complies with zoning rules.

terms.name: feePaid
terms.description: Whether required fees have been paid.

terms.name: documentsComplete
terms.description: Whether mandatory documents have been provided.

terms.name: decision
terms.description: Decision outcome for the permit (GRANT, REVIEW, REFUSE).
